title: Poki Unblocked: Access Free Online Games Anytime and Anywhere
body: Poki Unblocked: Access Free Online Games Anytime and Anywhere In today’s digital world, online gaming platforms like Poki have become a go-to destination for players seeking quick and entertaining games. However, access to gaming websites is often restricted on school, office, or public networks. This is where Poki Unblocked comes into play, offering a solution for gamers to enjoy free online games without limitations. In this guide, we’ll cover everything you need to know about Poki Unblocked —from what it is and how it works to safe access methods, the top games you can play, and tips to enhance your gaming experience. What is Poki? Poki is a leading online gaming platform that offers free-to-play games across multiple genres, including: Action Games Puzzle Games Sports Games Adventure Games Multiplayer Games With its user-friendly interface and an extensive collection of games, Poki caters to players of all ages. Whether you enjoy casual games for fun or competitive challenges, Poki provides endless entertainment without downloads or installations. Why is Poki Blocked in Schools and Workplaces? title: The Hashgraph Group launches $100 million Web3 fund in the UAE
body: The Hashgraph Group (THG), the Swiss-based international business, venture capital, and technology company, that operates exclusively within the Hedera ecosystem, has secured a fund management license through its subsidiary Hashgraph Ventures Manager Ltd in ADGM UAE. The $100 million global Web3 venture capital fund (Hashgraph Venture Fund) is licensed by the ADGM’s regulatory authority, the Financial Services Regulatory Authority (FSRA). Hashgraph Ventures Manager will make strategic investments in deep-tech companies that are developing innovative solutions in AI, IoT, blockchain/decentralized ledger technology (DLT), robotics, and quantum computing. The Hashgraph Association will seed the fund with $20 million The Hashgraph Association (THA) is seeding the Hashgraph Venture Fund-I (HVF-I) as an anchor investor with USD 20 million, representing 20% of the total fund size. Benefitting companies will have access to THG’s well-established Web3 Venture Studio programs, which actively shape and enable portfolio companies through expertise in engineering, productization, and commercialization. Kamal Youssefi, President of The Hashgraph Association, stated: “We believe in co-funding innovative entrepreneurs and enterprises that are building the next generation of Web3 solutions on Hedera that enable financial inclusion with a positive socioeconomic impact. We look forward to this unique opportunity to gain exposure to leading-edge Web3 companies through investment in Hashgraph Ventures Fund and generating long-term capital growth for the Hedera ecosystem.” THG operates venture studios across Qatar, KSA, and Morocco THG operates globally with a diverse network of government-backed co-investment venture studios, which include the DeepTech Venture Studio signed with the Ministry of Investment of Saudi Arabia (MISA) earlier this year. The studio is worth USD 250M over 5 years. It also operates the Digital Assets Venture Studio in strategic partnership with the Qatar Finance City (QFC), the Web3 Venture Studio with IIT Madras in India, and the DeepTech Venture Studio in strategic partnership with INNOVX in Morocco, alongside various other co-investment partners. The strategic Web3 venture fund in the UAE will focus on generating attractive long-term returns by investing in proven early-stage and well-established companies utilizing deep technologies to build and commercialize enterprise-grade solutions and products for the Web3 economy. Stefan Deiss, Co-Founder & CEO of The Hashgraph Group, said, “We have received a lot of interest in our regulated Web3 ventures fund from existing co-investors and ecosystem partners, including government institutions, sovereign wealth funds, venture capital, family offices, and other institutional investors. With extensive expertise in Web3, we are focused on generating attractive returns through investments in companies that leverage the convergence of deep-tech intersecting on the Hedera DLT network.” Land a High-Paying Web3 Job in 90 Days: The Ultimate Roadmap

title: YoHoHo: The Ultimate Guide to Gameplay, Strategies, and Winning Tips
body: YoHoHo: The Ultimate Guide to Gameplay, Strategies, and Winning Tips YoHoHo has become one of the most exciting and addictive multiplayer games in recent years. This pirate-themed action game, known for its simple yet competitive gameplay, allows players to fight for treasure, dominate opponents, and become the ultimate pirate. Whether you’re playing solo or competing against friends, YoHoHo combines fast-paced action, strategy, and fun in a unique and colorful pirate world. In this detailed guide, we’ll cover everything you need to know about YoHoHo —from its gameplay and features to the best strategies and winning tips. So, grab your pirate hat and sword, and let’s set sail! What is YoHoHo? YoHoHo is an online multiplayer game where players take on the role of pirates fighting for treasure and dominance. The game revolves around a battle royale-style format , where you must defeat other pirates, collect gold, and grow stronger to outlast your opponents. Designed for simplicity and fun, YoHoHo is accessible to players of all ages. It can be played on browsers , making it popular in schools, offices, and casual gaming environments. Where to Play YoHoHo You can play YoHoHo for free on various platforms: Browser-Based Play: Websites like CrazyGames , Poki , and Miniclip host the game. Mobile Devices: Available for Android and iOS users for gaming on the go. No downloads or installations are required for the browser version—simply visit the site and start playing! YoHoHo Gameplay Mechanics The mechanics of YoHoHo are simple yet engaging, offering quick and competitive matches. Here’s how the game works: 1. Choose Your Pirate Players begin as pirates armed with a basic sword. As you collect gold and defeat opponents, you grow larger and stronger, gaining an advantage in battles. 2. Battle Other Pirates Use your sword to attack other players. The goal is to reduce their health and knock them out of the arena. Avoid getting hit—if your health bar depletes, you’ll lose the match. 3. Collect Gold Scattered throughout the arena are gold coins. Collecting gold increases your pirate’s size and power. The larger you grow, the more dominant you become, making it easier to defeat opponents. 4. Shrinking Arena Similar to a battle royale game, the play area shrinks over time, forcing players into close combat. Stay within the safe zone to avoid losing health and getting eliminated. 5. Upgrade Your Character As you progress, you can unlock new characters with unique abilities and weapons. Gold collected in matches can be used to purchase upgrades or unlock stronger pirates. Key Features of YoHoHo YoHoHo offers a variety of exciting features that make it a fan favorite among casual and competitive gamers: 1. Pirate-Themed Action Play as a pirate and fight for treasure in beautifully designed pirate arenas. 2. Battle Royale Gameplay The shrinking arena forces players into intense battles, testing their reflexes and strategy. 3. Multiplayer Mode Compete against real players online or challenge your friends to private matches. 4. Gold Collection System Collect gold coins to grow stronger, dominate enemies, and climb the leaderboard. 5. Character Upgrades Unlock and upgrade new pirate characters with unique appearances, skills, and weapons. 6. Simple Controls The game features intuitive controls, making it accessible for beginners and casual players. How to Play YoHoHo: Step-by-Step Guide 1. Start the Game Visit a gaming website hosting YoHoHo or download the mobile version. Click “Play” to enter the pirate arena. 2. Use Simple Controls Move your pirate using the arrow keys (on PC) or on-screen joystick (on mobile). Attack by clicking the mouse or tapping the screen. 3. Collect Gold Move around the arena to collect gold coins. The more gold you collect, the larger and stronger you become. 4. Defeat Opponents Attack smaller opponents to eliminate them while avoiding larger, more powerful pirates. Watch your health bar—if it runs out, you’re out of the match! 5. Stay in the Safe Zone The arena shrinks over time, so stay within the safe area to avoid losing health. 6. Grow and Dominate Use your size advantage to take down opponents and dominate the match. The last pirate standing wins! Top Strategies to Win in YoHoHo To become a pirate champion in YoHoHo , you need a mix of strategy, quick reflexes, and smart decision-making. Here are the best tips and strategies to dominate the arena: 1. Focus on Gold Early At the start of the match, focus on collecting as much gold as possible to grow your size. Avoid unnecessary fights until you’re strong enough to take on opponents. 2. Target Smaller Opponents Look for smaller pirates to eliminate early. They are easier to defeat and will help you grow quickly. 3. Avoid Larger Pirates Steer clear of bigger, stronger opponents until you’ve collected enough gold to challenge them. Use your speed to escape dangerous situations. 4. Use the Arena Borders to Your Advantage Push opponents towards the shrinking edges of the arena to eliminate them. Stay in the center of the safe zone to reduce the risk of being trapped. 5. Time Your Attacks Don’t rush into fights. Wait for the right moment to strike when opponents are distracted or weak. 6. Upgrade Your Pirate Use the gold you earn to unlock stronger pirates with better weapons and skills. Upgraded pirates give you a significant advantage in battles. 7. Keep Moving Stay mobile to avoid getting surrounded or attacked. Moving constantly makes you a harder target to hit. Why YoHoHo is So Popular YoHoHo has gained immense popularity for several reasons: 1. Simple Yet Addictive Gameplay The straightforward mechanics make it easy for anyone to pick up and play, while the competitive nature keeps players coming back for more. 2. Fun Pirate Theme The pirate-themed design, characters, and gameplay add a fun and engaging twist to the battle royale genre. 3. Quick Matches Matches are fast-paced and only take a few minutes, making YoHoHo perfect for short gaming sessions during breaks. 4. Free to Play YoHoHo is free to play on browsers and mobile devices, making it accessible to everyone. 5. Multiplayer Thrill Competing against real players worldwide adds excitement and unpredictability to every match. Conclusion: Why You Should Play YoHoHo YoHoHo is a fantastic combination of fun, strategy, and fast-paced action. With its pirate theme, simple controls, and competitive gameplay, the game offers hours of entertainment for players of all ages. Whether you’re aiming to collect the most gold, eliminate opponents, or simply have fun with friends, YoHoHo provides an addictive and rewarding gaming experience. If you haven’t tried YoHoHo yet, set sail today and test your skills in this thrilling pirate battle arena. Remember, only the smartest and strongest pirate will emerge as the ultimate champion. Are you ready to claim your treasure and rule the seas? Play YoHoHo now and become the fiercest pirate in the arena! title: Ethereum Whale Dominance Hits Record High: What Comes Next?
body: The post Ethereum Whale Dominance Hits Record High: What Comes Next? appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Ethereum whale dominance is at the peak and it’s hard to ignore what this could mean for the future. It is highest in history so far. While smaller investors hold less than ever, whales are quietly accumulating more ETH. Is this a sign of another bull run, or something else entirely? Whales Are in Control As of now, 104 wallets hold over 100,000 ETH each. That’s 57.35% of Ethereum’s total supply, the highest level ever recorded. While these massive wallets grow in power, mid-sized investors (those holding between 100 and 100,000 ETH) now control just 33.46%, the lowest share in history. Source : Santiment It’s not looking great for small investors either. Wallets with less than 100 ETH make up just 9.19% of the supply. That’s their smallest slice since January 2021. The trend has been building since late 2022, when big investors began aggressively accumulating ETH. Clearly, the whales know something, and they’re playing the long game marking the rise in Ethereum whale dominance. History Shows Whales Move the Market This isn’t the first time whales have shaped Ethereum’s price. Back in late 2020 and early 2021, similar levels of whale accumulation kicked off a massive bull run that sent ETH to new heights. But there’s a flip side to this. When whale dominance peaked in 2022, it was followed by a sharp price correction. Whale activity doesn’t just happen—it’s often a signal. Right now, ETH sits at $4,015, with immediate resistance at $4,109. On the 4-hour chart, the nearest 20-day moving average (MA) is at $3,931, and strong support rests at $3,575, backed by the MA 200. Source : Coinglass The technical indicators show cautious optimism. The Relative Strength Index (RSI) sits at 58.42, meaning ETH isn’t in overbought territory yet. However, On-Balance Volume (OBV) at -44.94 reflects a level of hesitation among investors. Money In, Money Out: Investor Breakdown A closer look at investor behavior adds more context. According to IntoTheBlock data, 74% of Ethereum holders have kept their assets for over a year. Short-term holders break down like this: 22% bought ETH between 1 month and 12 months ago. 4% are newer investors, buying within the last month. Profitability paints a bullish picture, too. Right now: 94% of investors are in profit. 3% are breaking even. Only 3% are at a loss, primarily those who bought during Ethereum’s all-time high (ATH) of $4,891 in November 2021. Source : IntoTheBlock However, there are still around 4.27 million addresses holding 1.21 million ETH in loss. Most of these losses occurred when ETH was purchased between $4,093 and $4,891—not far from the current price level. What’s Next? So what does all of this mean for the average investor? Well, it depends. On the bullish side, whales seem confident. They’re buying up Ethereum, especially during dips, and this often signals long-term optimism. If this trend continues, ETH could climb to the $4,500 – $5,000 range. But there’s a risk, too. When a few wallets hold so much of the supply, the market becomes vulnerable. A coordinated sell-off from these whales could cause a sudden drop. It’s something to watch closely as ETH’s story unfolds. Either way, Ethereum whale dominance is a clear reminder: the big players still have the most power in this market.

title: Shooting Games: Top Features, Types, and Tips for Mastering Gameplay
body: Shooting Games: Top Features, Types, and Tips for Mastering Gameplay Shooting games have been a cornerstone of the gaming industry for decades, offering players a mix of adrenaline-pumping action, strategy, and immersive experiences. From classic arcade shooters to modern first-person shooter (FPS) masterpieces, shooting games are beloved by gamers of all skill levels for their engaging gameplay and competitive edge. In this comprehensive guide, we’ll explore everything about shooting games , including their key features, types, the most popular titles, and tips to master your skills. Whether you’re a beginner looking for advice or an experienced player seeking new challenges, this article is for you! What are Shooting Games? Shooting games are a genre of video games that focus on combat using firearms, ranged weapons, or other projectile-based attacks. The primary goal is often to defeat enemies, complete missions, or survive against waves of opponents. These games test players’ hand-eye coordination, accuracy, reflexes , and strategic thinking. Whether played solo, with friends, or in competitive multiplayer environments, shooting games deliver unmatched excitement and action. Key Features of Shooting Games Shooting games are defined by several core features that set them apart from other genres: 1. Combat-Focused Gameplay Shooting games revolve around combat scenarios that require precision, quick reflexes, and tactical planning. 2. Weapon Variety From pistols and rifles to futuristic energy weapons, shooting games offer an extensive arsenal of guns and gear for players to use. 3. Multiplayer Modes Many modern shooting games feature online multiplayer modes, allowing players to compete or cooperate with others globally. 4. Realistic Graphics and Sound Effects Advanced graphics and immersive sound design enhance the intensity of shooting games, making every gunshot and explosion feel lifelike. 5. Single-Player Campaigns Some shooting games offer story-driven single-player campaigns with missions, objectives, and rich narratives. 6. Customization Options Players can customize characters, weapons, and loadouts to suit their playstyles. 7. Competitive Esports Scene Shooting games are a popular genre in esports, with tournaments offering huge prizes and attracting millions of viewers worldwide. Types of Shooting Games Shooting games come in various types, each offering a unique gameplay experience: 1. First-Person Shooter (FPS) In FPS games, players view the game world from the first-person perspective , seeing through the eyes of their character. Examples: Call of Duty Counter-Strike: Global Offensive (CS:GO) Halo Infinite 2. Third-Person Shooter (TPS) TPS games provide a third-person camera view , where players can see their characters on the screen. Examples: Fortnite Gears of War The Division 2 3. Battle Royale Shooters A subgenre where players compete in a shrinking map to be the last person (or team) standing. These games mix shooting skills with survival strategy. Examples: PUBG (PlayerUnknown’s Battlegrounds) Apex Legends Call of Duty: Warzone 4. Tactical Shooters Tactical shooters focus on realistic gameplay with an emphasis on team coordination, strategy, and precision. Examples: Rainbow Six Siege Valorant Arma 3 5. Arcade Shooters Arcade shooters emphasize fun, fast-paced action over realism. These games often feature power-ups, bright visuals, and over-the-top gameplay. Examples: DOOM Eternal Cuphead Metal Slug 6. Rail Shooters Rail shooters guide players through a fixed path where they focus solely on shooting enemies without controlling movement. Examples: House of the Dead Star Fox 64 7. Shoot ‘Em Ups Shoot ‘Em Ups are fast-paced, retro-style games where players control a character or ship to shoot down waves of enemies. Examples: Space Invaders Galaga Ikaruga Top Shooting Games of All Time Here’s a list of some of the most popular and critically acclaimed shooting games: 1. Call of Duty Series Known for its thrilling FPS gameplay, cinematic campaigns, and competitive multiplayer modes. 2. Fortnite A third-person battle royale game with unique building mechanics that set it apart from the competition. 3. Counter-Strike: Global Offensive (CS:GO) A classic tactical shooter that remains one of the most-played esports titles worldwide. 4. PUBG: Battlegrounds A pioneer of the battle royale genre that challenges players to survive in large, open-world maps. 5. Apex Legends A fast-paced battle royale shooter with unique character abilities and team-based tactics. 6. Overwatch 2 A hero-based shooter where players use unique abilities to support their team in objective-based gameplay. 7. DOOM Eternal An action-packed FPS that delivers non-stop combat and brutal, satisfying gameplay. 8. Halo Infinite The latest installment in the Halo series, featuring futuristic weapons and an expansive multiplayer mode. 9. Valorant A tactical shooter blending precise gunplay with character-specific abilities. 10. Battlefield Series Known for its large-scale battles, destructible environments, and realistic military combat. Tips to Master Shooting Games Becoming a skilled shooter takes practice, strategy, and focus. Here are some tips to help you dominate in shooting games: 1. Improve Your Aim Use aim training tools like Aim Lab or Kovaak’s FPS Aim Trainer to practice precision. Adjust your mouse sensitivity or controller settings for smoother aiming. 2. Master Movement Learn to strafe, crouch, jump, and sprint efficiently to outmaneuver opponents. Use cover to avoid taking unnecessary damage. 3. Learn Maps and Game Modes Understanding the layout of maps, choke points, and spawn locations is crucial for tactical gameplay. In team-based games, play according to the mode’s objectives (e.g., capture the flag, domination, or bomb defusal). 4. Choose the Right Weapons Experiment with different weapons (snipers, rifles, SMGs) to find what suits your playstyle. Customize loadouts for different situations—long-range, close combat, or support roles. 5. Communicate with Your Team Use voice chat or pings to coordinate with teammates and share valuable information. Team communication is vital for tactical shooters and battle royale games. 6. Play Regularly and Watch Others Regular practice improves reflexes and decision-making. Watch professional players or streamers to learn advanced strategies and techniques. 7. Manage Resources and Positioning Conserve ammo, health packs, and grenades. Use them strategically. Position yourself for advantageous angles and avoid being out in the open. Why Shooting Games Are So Popular Shooting games remain popular for several reasons: Adrenaline Rush: Fast-paced combat and intense action provide an unmatched gaming thrill. Competitive Nature: Multiplayer modes and esports tournaments create a competitive environment for players. Replayability: Shooting games offer endless replay value through challenges, customization, and updates. Social Interaction: Online multiplayer fosters teamwork, communication, and friendships. Skill Development: These games improve hand-eye coordination, reflexes, and decision-making skills. Conclusion: Why Shooting Games Deliver Excitement Shooting games are a cornerstone of the gaming industry, offering action-packed gameplay, immersive graphics, and endless opportunities for competition. Whether you prefer fast-paced battle royale games, tactical FPS matches , or fun arcade shooters, the genre has something for everyone. By mastering your aim, improving movement, and understanding strategies, you can become a top player and enjoy shooting games to the fullest. Ready to jump in? Choose your favorite shooting game, team up with friends, and test your skills on the battlefield. The excitement and challenge of shooting games await you! title: Pou: The Ultimate Guide to Features, Gameplay, and Tips for Raising Your Virtual Pet
body: Pou: The Ultimate Guide to Features, Gameplay, and Tips for Raising Your Virtual Pet In the world of mobile gaming, Pou remains one of the most beloved and nostalgic virtual pet games ever created. With its cute alien pet, simple gameplay, and endless customization options, Pou has captured the hearts of millions around the globe. Developed by Zakeh , Pou offers players the experience of nurturing and caring for their very own virtual pet . Whether you’re feeding it, playing mini-games, or customizing its look, Pou is a perfect blend of fun, responsibility, and creativity. In this article, we’ll dive deep into everything you need to know about Pou —from its features and gameplay to tips for keeping your virtual pet happy and thriving. What is Pou? Pou is a mobile virtual pet game where players take care of a cute, alien-like creature. Launched in 2012 by Zakeh , Pou quickly rose to fame for its engaging yet simple mechanics. Players can interact with Pou in various ways, such as: Feeding it food Playing games to earn coins Cleaning and caring for its health Customizing its appearance with outfits, accessories, and colors Pou combines elements of responsibility with entertainment, offering players the satisfaction of nurturing a pet without the real-world commitment. How to Download Pou Pou is widely available on major platforms, making it accessible to players everywhere: Android Users: Download from the Google Play Store iOS Users: Available on the App Store Windows Users: Earlier versions of the game can be accessed on PC The game is free to play, but optional in-game purchases are available for those looking to buy exclusive items or upgrades. Key Features of Pou Pou’s appeal lies in its simplicity, addictive gameplay, and variety of activities. Here are the standout features of the game: 1. Virtual Pet Care Feed, bathe, and take care of Pou to keep it happy and healthy. Pou has energy, hunger, and cleanliness meters that you must maintain. 2. Fun Mini-Games Pou offers a wide selection of mini-games to keep you entertained while earning coins. Popular mini-games include: Sky Jump: Bounce Pou as high as possible. Food Drop: Catch falling food while avoiding harmful objects. Pou Popper: A bubble shooter-style game. Hill Drive: Drive Pou across hills while collecting coins. Each game provides rewards to spend on items and upgrades. 3. Customization Options Pou is incredibly customizable. You can change: Pou’s color and shape Outfits, hats, and glasses Room backgrounds, wallpapers, and furniture Coins earned from mini-games can be spent on accessories, food, and other items. 4. Interaction and Growth Talk to Pou, and it will mimic your voice, adding a layer of fun to the game. Watch Pou grow over time , becoming a more unique version of itself as you care for it. 5. Achievements and Progression Complete achievements to earn rewards and unlock new items. Progression in the game encourages consistent interaction and care for your Pou. 6. Social Features Visit your friends’ Pous and see how they’ve customized their pets. Share your Pou’s progress and look with others. How to Play Pou: A Step-by-Step Guide 1. Getting Started Download Pou from the Play Store or App Store. Launch the game, and you’ll meet your new virtual pet. 2. Feeding Your Pou Access the kitchen to feed Pou various foods like fruits, burgers, and drinks. Keep an eye on Pou’s hunger meter to ensure it’s well-fed. 3. Cleaning and Health Pou gets dirty over time. Visit the bathroom to clean it with soap and water. If Pou feels sick, use the health potions available in the lab to restore its health. 4. Playing Mini-Games Go to the Game Room to access Pou’s mini-games. Play games to earn coins, which you can use to buy food, outfits, and room decorations. 5. Customizing Your Pou Visit the shop to buy clothes, hats, and accessories. Use coins to customize your Pou’s look and personality. You can also decorate Pou’s rooms, including the kitchen, bathroom, and living room. 6. Watching Pou Grow As you take care of Pou, it will gradually grow over time. Interact with it daily to unlock achievements and new features. Best Mini-Games in Pou Pou’s mini-games are one of the most entertaining parts of the game. Here are some fan favorites: 1. Sky Jump Help Pou jump higher and higher by landing on platforms. Collect coins along the way to boost your score. 2. Food Drop Catch the food falling from the sky while avoiding harmful objects like bombs. A perfect mix of fun and challenge! 3. Pou Popper A bubble-shooting game where you match colored bubbles to clear the board and earn coins. 4. Hill Drive Drive Pou across hills and slopes while collecting coins. Be careful not to crash! 5. Memory Game Test your memory skills by matching cards with different symbols or items. Tips to Keep Your Pou Happy and Healthy To become a pro at caring for Pou, follow these helpful tips: 1. Feed Pou Regularly Keep Pou’s hunger meter full by feeding it a variety of foods. Avoid feeding it too much junk food, as this can reduce its health. 2. Keep Pou Clean Bathe Pou regularly in the bathroom to keep its cleanliness meter high. 3. Play Mini-Games to Earn Coins Coins are essential for buying food, accessories, and customizations. Play mini-games often to build your coin stash. 4. Use Health Potions If Pou gets sick, use health potions from the lab to restore its well-being quickly. 5. Experiment with Customizations Keep changing Pou’s outfits, accessories, and room decorations to make the game more engaging. 6. Play Daily Consistent interaction with Pou keeps it happy and unlocks new achievements and rewards. Why is Pou So Popular? Pou’s charm lies in its simplicity and universal appeal. Here’s why the game remains popular years after its release: 1. Nostalgic Gameplay Pou taps into the nostalgia of classic virtual pet games like Tamagotchi while introducing modern features. 2. Perfect for All Ages The game’s simplicity makes it ideal for players of all ages, from children to adults. 3. Relaxing and Stress-Free Pou offers a calm, stress-free experience where players can unwind and enjoy taking care of their virtual pet. 4. Endless Customization The wide variety of outfits, accessories, and room decorations keeps the game fresh and engaging. 5. Offline Play Pou can be played without an internet connection, making it accessible anytime, anywhere. Conclusion: Why You Should Play Pou Pou is a delightful and addictive virtual pet game that offers hours of fun and creativity. Whether you’re feeding it, playing mini-games, or customizing its appearance, Pou provides a rewarding experience for players of all ages. With its charming simplicity, endless customization, and engaging activities, Pou continues to be a fan-favorite mobile game. If you haven’t experienced the joy of raising your own virtual pet yet, download Pou today and start your journey! Take care of Pou, play mini-games, and unlock endless possibilities. Your new virtual pet is waiting for you! title: Basketball Bros: The Ultimate Guide to Features, Gameplay, and Winning Strategies
body: Basketball Bros: The Ultimate Guide to Features, Gameplay, and Winning Strategies Basketball Bros is an exciting and fast-paced basketball game that combines arcade-style action, multiplayer fun, and competitive gameplay. Whether you’re a casual player looking to enjoy quick matches with friends or a basketball enthusiast aiming to dominate the scoreboard, Basketball Bros delivers a fun, interactive, and addictive gaming experience . In this detailed guide, we’ll explore everything you need to know about Basketball Bros , including its features, gameplay mechanics, strategies to win, and why it’s becoming a fan favorite among sports gamers. What is Basketball Bros? Basketball Bros is a multiplayer basketball game that blends fast-paced gameplay with simple mechanics, making it accessible to players of all skill levels. Designed for quick and competitive matches, the game allows you to challenge friends, test your reflexes, and showcase your shooting skills in intense head-to-head matches . What sets Basketball Bros apart is its: Simple yet competitive gameplay Multiplayer functionality for online or local play Unique characters and courts that add personality to the game Whether you’re dunking on opponents, draining three-pointers, or pulling off slick moves, Basketball Bros ensures non-stop action and entertainment. Key Features of Basketball Bros Here are the standout features that make Basketball Bros a must-play game: 1. Multiplayer Mode Compete with friends in 1v1 or team matches through online or local multiplayer modes. Test your skills against players worldwide or challenge friends to private matches. 2. Quick and Easy Gameplay The game’s intuitive controls make it easy to pick up and play. Matches are fast-paced, typically lasting a few minutes, making it perfect for quick gaming sessions. 3. Customizable Characters Choose from a variety of characters, each with unique abilities and appearances . Customize your basketball players with different outfits, accessories, and shoes to stand out on the court. 4. Fun and Dynamic Courts Play on different courts with unique themes, designs, and challenges. Each court adds an exciting twist to the gameplay, keeping matches fresh and engaging. 5. Arcade-Style Action Basketball Bros combines realistic basketball elements with arcade-style fun, including power-ups, trick shots, and special moves. 6. Competitive Leaderboards Track your progress and climb the leaderboards by winning matches and improving your skills. Compete against top players globally to showcase your basketball prowess. 7. Offline Play Enjoy the game even without an internet connection in offline mode , where you can challenge AI opponents. How to Play Basketball Bros: Gameplay Mechanics Basketball Bros is designed for accessibility, making it easy for anyone to play while offering depth for skilled players. Here’s how to get started: 1. Game Controls The controls are simple and intuitive: Move: Use directional keys, joystick, or swipe gestures (on mobile) to control your player’s movement. Shoot: Tap or click to shoot the basketball. Time your release for accuracy. Dunk/Trick Move: Execute dunks or tricks by tapping special move buttons near the hoop. Defend: Steal the ball or block shots using defensive buttons. 2. Scoring Points The objective of the game is to outscore your opponent within the time limit: Standard Shots: Shoot from inside or outside the paint to earn points. Three-Pointers: Score from beyond the three-point line for extra points. Dunks: Dunks are high-percentage shots that energize your gameplay. 3. Power-Ups and Boosts Basketball Bros features power-ups that can give you an edge over your opponent: Speed Boosts: Increase your player’s movement speed temporarily. Accuracy Buffs: Improve your shooting accuracy for a limited time. Defense Power-Up: Enhance your ability to steal or block shots. 4. Game Modes Basketball Bros offers multiple modes to keep the gameplay exciting: Quick Match: Jump into an instant game against AI or real opponents. Multiplayer Mode: Play with friends or compete in online matches. Tournaments: Compete in tournaments to unlock rewards and prove your skills. Practice Mode: Sharpen your shooting and movement skills against AI defenders. Winning Strategies for Basketball Bros Here are proven strategies to help you dominate in Basketball Bros and outplay your opponents: 1. Master the Timing of Your Shots Shooting accuracy is key. Time your shots carefully—release the button at the peak of your jump for the best chance of scoring. Practice shooting from various positions to develop consistency. 2. Use Power-Ups Wisely Save your power-ups for critical moments, such as close games or when you need to catch up on the scoreboard. Activate speed boosts to outrun defenders and create open shooting opportunities. 3. Play Aggressive Defense Use the steal button to intercept your opponent’s dribble. Timing is crucial to avoid fouls. Position yourself to block shots near the basket and force your opponent into tough shots. 4. Take Advantage of Dunks Dunks are high-percentage scoring opportunities. Move close to the basket to perform a slam dunk when there’s an opening. Use quick movements to create space for an easy dunk. 5. Learn Court Layouts Each court has unique challenges and opportunities. Study the layout to find the best shooting positions and defensive strategies. 6. Use Special Moves Trick shots and special moves can surprise your opponent and give you a scoring edge. Experiment with moves to keep your gameplay unpredictable. 7. Stay Patient and Focused Don’t rush your shots or passes. Take time to set up plays, especially in close matches. Focus on both offense and defense to maintain balance during games. Why Basketball Bros is So Popular Basketball Bros has gained a loyal following due to its unique combination of fun gameplay, accessibility, and competition . Here’s why players love it: 1. Easy to Learn, Hard to Master While the controls are simple, mastering advanced strategies like power-ups, timing, and defense requires skill, keeping players engaged. 2. Competitive Multiplayer Matches The multiplayer mode adds excitement, allowing players to compete against friends or online opponents for bragging rights. 3. Short, Action-Packed Matches Matches are short but full of action, making Basketball Bros ideal for quick gaming sessions during breaks or downtime. 4. Engaging Customization Players love the ability to customize characters, outfits, and accessories, giving the game a personal touch. 5. Fun for All Ages The game appeals to both casual players and basketball fans, offering entertainment for kids, teens, and adults. Tips for Improving Your Skills in Basketball Bros Here are some extra tips to level up your gameplay: Practice Shooting: Spend time in practice mode to perfect your shot timing. Play Online Matches: Competing against real players helps improve your reflexes and strategy. Watch Opponents: Study your opponents’ moves to anticipate their next steps. Unlock Upgrades: Customize and upgrade your players for better performance. Conclusion: Why Basketball Bros is Worth Playing Basketball Bros is an exciting and engaging basketball game that combines simplicity, fun, and competition into one thrilling package. Whether you’re looking for quick matches, multiplayer battles, or the chance to showcase your skills, Basketball Bros delivers an unforgettable experience for players of all ages. With its customizable characters, dynamic courts, and arcade-style action, Basketball Bros offers endless entertainment for basketball fans and casual gamers alike. Master your shots, outplay your opponents, and dominate the court—one game at a time! Ready to hit the court? Play Basketball Bros today and experience the thrill of arcade basketball! title: FNAF 2: A Comprehensive Guide to Five Nights at Freddy’s 2
body: FNAF 2: A Comprehensive Guide to Five Nights at Freddy’s 2 Five Nights at Freddy’s 2 (FNAF 2) remains one of the most iconic games in the horror genre, continuing the legacy of the Five Nights at Freddy’s franchise. Released in 2014 by indie developer Scott Cawthon , FNAF 2 builds on its predecessor’s success with more terrifying animatronics, challenging gameplay , and a gripping backstory. Whether you’re new to the franchise or a seasoned horror enthusiast, this guide will provide everything you need to know about FNAF 2 —from gameplay mechanics and story details to survival tips and fan theories. What is FNAF 2? Five Nights at Freddy’s 2 is the second installment in the FNAF series , a point-and-click survival horror game. Players assume the role of a night security guard at Freddy Fazbear’s Pizza , tasked with monitoring security cameras and surviving against malfunctioning animatronics that roam the pizzeria after dark. Unlike its predecessor, FNAF 2 introduces new mechanics, more animatronics , and no doors to block the relentless attackers, making the game significantly more challenging and frightening. FNAF 2 Release Date and Platforms FNAF 2 was released on November 11, 2014 , only a few months after the first game. It became instantly popular for its fresh mechanics and lore development. Available Platforms: PC (Steam) Mobile (Android and iOS) PlayStation, Xbox, and Nintendo Switch (as part of the FNAF bundle) FNAF 2 Storyline and Setting The Premise The game takes place in 1987 , serving as a prequel to the first Five Nights at Freddy’s game. Players take on the role of Jeremy Fitzgerald , a newly hired night guard at a revamped Freddy Fazbear’s Pizza location. The establishment has introduced “Toy Animatronics” , modernized versions of the older animatronics. However, despite their cheerful exterior, these new animatronics are prone to strange behaviors at night. The Bite of ’87 FNAF 2 subtly references the infamous “Bite of ’87” , a major event in the franchise lore where an animatronic attacked a customer, leading to severe injuries. This storyline detail adds layers of intrigue, encouraging players to explore the mysteries of Freddy Fazbear’s Pizza. FNAF 2 Gameplay Mechanics The gameplay in FNAF 2 builds on the original formula while introducing new elements: 1. Monitor Security Cameras Similar to FNAF 1, players must use security cameras to track the animatronics’ movements. Cameras cover various areas, including hallways, party rooms, and the prize corner. 2. No Safety Doors Unlike the first game, FNAF 2 does not include security doors to block animatronics. Players must rely on wearing a Freddy Fazbear mask or using lights to deter attackers. 3. Freddy Fazbear Mask Players can wear a Freddy mask to trick most animatronics into thinking they are one of them. However, some animatronics, like Foxy, are not fooled by the mask. 4. Wind Up the Music Box Players must wind up a music box in the Prize Corner to prevent the Puppet (Marionette) from attacking. Failing to keep the music box wound up results in an inevitable game over. 5. Flashlight The flashlight is essential for checking the dark hallways and deterring Foxy and Mangle . Flashlight power is limited, so players must use it wisely. All Animatronics in FNAF 2 FNAF 2 features 10 animatronics that players must monitor and survive against. They are divided into two categories: 1. Toy Animatronics The Toy Animatronics are the new, shinier versions of the original characters. Toy Freddy: A friendly-looking bear who becomes hostile at night. Toy Bonnie: A blue bunny with a guitar. Approaches from the air vents. Toy Chica: A yellow chicken with a bib that says “Let’s Party!” Mangle: A broken, spider-like animatronic who hangs from the ceiling. Balloon Boy (BB): A mischievous character who disables the flashlight, making Foxy harder to manage. 2. Withered Animatronics The older animatronics are worn-out versions of the originals, lurking in the shadows. Withered Freddy: Resembles the Freddy from FNAF 1 but with a damaged appearance. Withered Bonnie: Missing its face, creating a terrifying and unsettling design. Withered Chica: Distorted jaws and broken arms make her one of the creepiest animatronics. Withered Foxy: Requires careful flashlight management to prevent attacks. 3. The Puppet (Marionette) The Puppet hides in the Prize Corner and is awakened if the music box is not wound up. Once it activates, there’s no way to stop it from attacking. Tips to Survive in FNAF 2 FNAF 2’s difficulty can feel overwhelming, especially for beginners. Here are essential tips to help you survive the nights: 1. Prioritize the Music Box Always keep an eye on the Prize Corner camera to wind up the music box. Letting it stop will summon the Puppet, resulting in a game over. 2. Use the Freddy Mask Wisely When animatronics appear in your office, put on the Freddy mask immediately to avoid being attacked. Balloon Boy, Toy Freddy, and Toy Bonnie can be fooled with the mask. 3. Manage Flashlight Power Flashlight power is limited, so avoid overusing it. Use the flashlight sparingly to check the hallways and stop Withered Foxy or Mangle. 4. Check the Vents Toy Bonnie, Toy Chica, and Balloon Boy use the air vents to sneak into the office. Use the cameras to monitor vent activity. 5. Stay Calm and Listen Audio cues are crucial. Listen for sounds like breathing, footsteps, and the rattling of vents to anticipate animatronic movements. Why FNAF 2 is a Fan Favorite FNAF 2 is often considered one of the best games in the Five Nights at Freddy’s series for several reasons: 1. Increased Challenge The lack of doors, introduction of new mechanics, and a larger roster of animatronics make the game more intense and challenging. 2. Richer Lore FNAF 2 expands on the mysterious lore of the franchise, including the origins of the animatronics and hints at the Bite of ’87 . 3. Improved Animatronic Designs The Toy and Withered Animatronics have iconic designs that are both unsettling and memorable, adding to the game’s creepy atmosphere. 4. Replay Value The game offers increasing difficulty across five nights , along with unlockable custom nights for added replayability. FNAF 2’s Legacy in the Horror Genre Five Nights at Freddy’s 2 solidified the franchise as a cornerstone of the horror gaming genre. It inspired sequels, spin-offs, merchandise, fan theories, and even a feature film adaptation. Its unique gameplay and spine-chilling atmosphere have earned it a loyal fanbase and continued popularity across YouTube and streaming platforms. Conclusion: Why FNAF 2 is a Must-Play Horror Game FNAF 2 delivers a heart-pounding survival horror experience with its terrifying animatronics, challenging mechanics, and gripping lore. As a prequel to the original game, it adds depth to the story of Freddy Fazbear’s Pizza while introducing innovative gameplay elements that keep players on edge. Whether you’re a horror fan, a newcomer to the series, or a returning player, FNAF 2 offers an unforgettable experience that tests your reflexes, resource management, and courage. Are you ready to survive the nights? Play FNAF 2 today and see if you can outlast the animatronics lurking in the shadows. title: Avalanche Unveils Major Network Upgrade to Boost Subnets and Smart Contracts
body: Two major developments in blockchain technology emerged this week, highlighting ongoing efforts to enhance scalability and efficiency across layer-1 networks. Avalanche rolled out its largest upgrade to date, Avalanche9000, introducing improvements that reduce costs for launching subnet blockchains and running smart contracts. Meanwhile, Monad Labs announced the formation of the Monad Foundation, an independent entity focused on governance and ecosystem development, signaling significant progress toward a potential mainnet launch. Avalanche Launches Avalanche9000 Upgrade to Usher in Hundreds of New Layer-1 Blockchains Avalanche (AVAX) - the application-friendly layer-1 blockchain - has officially rolled out its largest-ever upgrade, Avalanche9000, introducing key advancements aimed at enhancing its network efficiency and accessibility. Announced on Monday, the much-anticipated upgrade is poised to revolutionize the blockchain landscape by making it easier and significantly cheaper to launch subnet blockchains and deploy smart contracts. “This is the start of hundreds of Avalanche L1s launching,” Avalanche’s team proclaimed in a post on X. “Avalanche9000 reduces the cost to deploy an L1 by 99.9%, and with hundreds of L1s being developed on testnet, look out for an explosion of launches in the coming months.” Key Features of Avalanche9000 The Avalanche9000 upgrade integrates two major improvement proposals, ACP-77 and ACP-125, signaling a significant leap for developers, validators, and end-users. 1. Validator Optimization Through ACP-77 A major highlight of ACP-77 is its overhaul of validator requirements. Previously, validators had to stake a minimum of 2,000 AVAX tokens – valued at approximately $100,000 – to validate the main Avalanche network alongside any subnets they operated. This setup posed substantial financial and hardware burdens on participants. The “Etna” upgrade, as part of ACP-77, addresses this limitation by decoupling validators from the requirement to validate the primary chain when focusing on specific subnets. This change allows validators to dedicate their efforts to specific layer-1 subnets, cutting down operational costs and enabling more efficient hardware usage. With reduced entry barriers, the Etna upgrade paves the way for projects to bootstrap their own blockchains cost-effectively. Furthermore, it introduces regulatory flexibility, empowering subnet operators to meet specific jurisdictional requirements as needed. 2. Lowering Fees with ACP-125 Another pivotal enhancement is ACP-125, which directly impacts Avalanche’s primary smart contract chain, the C-Chain. The proposal reduces the base fee from 25 nAVAX to 1 nAVAX (roughly $0.00000004), addressing what the Avalanche team described as an ”artificially high” minimum fee. “The current minimum base fee of 25 nAVAX is higher than what the market demands, leading to artificially reduced network usage,” reads the official ACP-125 proposal on GitHub . “By lowering the minimum base fee to 1 nAVAX, we allow the market to dictate appropriate fee levels, resulting in a more efficient allocation of resources and potentially higher network usage.” This reduction is expected to stimulate activity on Avalanche’s C-Chain by making smart contract interactions significantly cheaper, catering to developers and users seeking affordable decentralized application (dApp) deployment. At the heart of Avalanche’s scalability lies its subnet architecture. Subnets are sovereign groups of validators working together to validate transactions on specific blockchains, offering a “blockchain-as-a-service” model that supports customization for diverse use cases. Subnets can tailor their parameters, including tokenomics, validator sets, and consensus mechanisms, enabling developers to create highly specialized layer-1 solutions without being tied to Avalanche’s main chain operations. This flexibility opens doors for innovation across industries ranging from gaming and decentralized finance (DeFi) to enterprise applications. Avalanche claims to already support over 500 layer-1 blockchains, with Avalanche9000 expected to accelerate subnet adoption significantly. The Avalanche9000 upgrade arrives on the back of substantial financial support and developer activity. Earlier this year, Avalanche launched its Avalanche9000 testnet, allocating over $40 million in retroactive rewards to developers building on the network. The testnet saw strong engagement, signaling growing enthusiasm among blockchain builders. Adding to this momentum, the Avalanche Foundation recently secured $250 million in funding through a locked token sale. The round was led by prominent venture capital firms including Galaxy Digital, Dragonfly Capital, and ParaFi Capital, signaling investor confidence in Avalanche’s vision. The capital injection will help ensure a smooth rollout of Avalanche9000 while supporting future ecosystem growth, developer incentives, and subnet launches. Avalanche: A Multi-Chain Powerhouse Avalanche’s architecture comprises three distinct blockchains optimized for specific functionalities: X-Chain (Exchange Chain): Handles the creation and trading of digital assets. P-Chain (Platform Chain): Coordinates validators and manages subnets. C-Chain (Contract Chain): Executes Ethereum-compatible smart contracts, making it ideal for dApp deployment. This multi-chain design, combined with Avalanche9000’s improvements, positions Avalanche as one of the most scalable and versatile layer-1 networks in the blockchain ecosystem. Monad Labs Unveils the Monad Foundation to Drive Blockchain Development Ahead of Mainnet Launch In related news, on Monday, Monad Labs announced the establishment of the Monad Foundation, an independent organization dedicated to advancing the growth, governance, and adoption of the Monad blockchain. The formation of the foundation marks a critical milestone for Monad, which recently rolled out its testnet and is now positioning itself closer to a potential mainnet and token launch. In its official blog post , the Monad Foundation described its mission as fostering validator-driven governance, supporting community-led improvement proposals, and providing tools and documentation for developers. The foundation will also play a pivotal role in ecosystem growth, marketing, and advisory initiatives for the Monad blockchain. ”We are sharing an exciting organizational update, signaling a next step in the evolution of the Monad blockchain: the Monad Foundation, an independent organization dedicated to encouraging the development and adoption of the Monad blockchain protocol,” the foundation announced. While the statement refrained from explicitly confirming a mainnet or token launch, the timing of the foundation’s launch has fueled speculation that such milestones could be imminent. This comes on the heels of Monad Labs' progressive testnet rollout, which began in November, a step widely regarded as a precursor to a full mainnet deployment. The Monad Foundation’s core focus areas include: Validator-Led Governance:The foundation will facilitate decentralized governance through validators, ensuring that key decisions about the protocol’s evolution are driven by stakeholders within the community. This approach aligns with the decentralized ethos of blockchain technology. Developer Support and Tools:Providing detailed developer documentation, tools, and educational resources will be central to the foundation’s activities. The goal is to create a robust developer ecosystem that supports the growth of decentralized applications (dApps) on the Monad blockchain. Ecosystem Development and Adoption:The foundation will engage in ecosystem development, offering marketing and advisory support for projects building on Monad. By fostering strategic partnerships and promoting community-led improvement proposals, the foundation aims to accelerate Monad’s adoption. The formation of the Monad Foundation comes amid increasing interest and investment in the Monad blockchain ecosystem. In July, three projects built on Monad announced securing venture capital funding, signaling growing confidence in the network’s potential. Earlier this year, Monad Labs made headlines when it raised $225 million in a Series A funding round led by Paradigm in April, reportedly at a $3 billion valuation. The funding points to strong backing from major players in the blockchain investment space and highlighted the industry’s recognition of Monad as a promising layer-1 solution. Monad aims to address Ethereum’s current scalability challenges by offering significant improvements in throughput and efficiency. Unlike layer-1 networks that replicate Ethereum’s existing codebase, Monad is building a brand-new Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) from the ground up. Monad leverages a pipelined architecture, a technical innovation that allows the blockchain to process multiple steps of transactions simultaneously. This design significantly enhances transaction throughput, making Monad a high-performance alternative to traditional Ethereum-compatible chains. By improving Ethereum’s operational efficiency while maintaining EVM compatibility, Monad enables developers to deploy Ethereum-based dApps with higher scalability, lower latency, and greater performance. The approach positions Monad as a next-generation layer-1 solution capable of supporting demanding decentralized applications. Mainnet Launch on the Horizon? The timing of the Monad Foundation's formation and the recent launch of Monad’s testnet have fueled anticipation within the crypto community. Typically, testnet deployments allow developers to test applications and protocols in a simulated environment, ironing out bugs before launching a mainnet. With Monad’s testnet already in progress, the community is speculating that a mainnet rollout—and potentially a token launch—could soon follow. The foundation’s focus on governance and ecosystem development further hints at readiness for a fully operational network. Validator participation, governance frameworks, and developer adoption are all critical components that must align ahead of a successful mainnet deployment. Monad’s emergence comes at a time when scaling solutions and Ethereum alternatives are in high demand. Ethereum remains the dominant smart contract platform, but its limited throughput and rising transaction fees continue to present challenges for developers and users. By building a new EVM optimized for performance, Monad positions itself as a solution that retains Ethereum’s compatibility while offering a scalable, high-throughput alternative. This is particularly significant as decentralized finance (DeFi), gaming, and other dApp sectors require networks that can process large volumes of transactions efficiently.

title: Bitcoin To Hit $180,000 If These Cycle Top Indicators Are Absent, Says VanEck’s Sigel
body: Bitcoin could soar to $180,000 in 2025 if key cycle top indicators remain muted, according to Matthew Sigel, Head of Digital Assets Research at VanEck. Speaking with podcast host Natalie Brunell, Sigel outlined a clear four-year pattern in Bitcoin’s price action that he believes has persisted through multiple market cycles. Why $180,000 Per Bitcoin Seems Plausible Sigel explained that Bitcoin tends to outperform nearly every other asset class for three years out of each four-year halving cycle, followed by a deep correction in the fourth year. Referencing a drawdown typically ranging from 60% to 80%, Sigel said this decline often arrives roughly two years after the BTC halving event. Since Bitcoin’s most recent halving took place in April 2024, Sigel sees 2024 and 2025 as potentially strong years. “That down year typically is the second year after the halving,” Sigel explained. “The Bitcoin halving occurred in April of this year. So 2024 [will be a] strong year, 2025 should be a strong year. I think 2026, unless something changes, would be a down year.” Related Reading: Can Bitcoin Hit $160,000 In 2025? Matrixport Thinks So Drawing on historical data, he recalled the smallest trough-to-peak appreciation in Bitcoin’s previous cycles, which was approximately 2,000%. Even if that figure halves to 1,000%, Sigel pointed out that Bitcoin could rise from a trough of around $18,000 to as high as $180,000 in the current cycle. “So I see an upside to $180,000 this cycle, and I think that’s likely to happen next year,” Sigel added. He also emphasized that Bitcoin’s volatility means the price could overshoot or undershoot that number, but that $180,000 represents a plausible target for 2024 if the pattern holds and no major “red light” indicators appear. Sigel broke down what he sees as the most important topping signals for traders to watch. The first involves derivatives funding rates: if the annualized cost to hold bullish Bitcoin positions on leveraged markets pushes above 10% for longer than a couple of months, Sigel considers that a red flag. “Some of those indicators include the funding rates. When the funding rate for Bitcoin exceeds 10% for more than a couple months, that tends to be a red light,” Sigel warned and explained that recent market activity reset elevated funding rates: “[Last week’s] washout eliminated that as well. So funding rates [are] not really flashing red.” The second is the level of unrealized profits on the blockchain, where on-chain analysis can reveal whether market participants’ cost basis is so low that significant profit-taking might soon create selling pressure. “We’re not seeing scary amounts of unrealized profits [yet],” Sigel noted. Finally, he said anecdotal evidence of widespread retail leverage or speculation could also flash warning lights. He explained that if all these risk indicators were to align at a certain price point—for example, if Bitcoin hit $150,000 and these metrics pointed to a market top—he would be cautious. However, he said that if the price reached around $180,000 without those signals appearing, there might still be room for further appreciation. Related Reading: National Bitcoin Reserve Initiative: MP Satoshi Hamada Urges Japan To Take Action “If we reach $180K and none of those lights are flashing, maybe we let it run. If all those lights are flashing and the price is $150K, I’m not gonna wait,” Sigel added. Next BTC Cycle Predictions He also explored the longer-term growth potential for Bitcoin by comparing it to gold’s market capitalization. Because about half of gold’s supply is used for industrial and jewelry purposes, he reasoned that the other half can be compared more directly to Bitcoin’s function as an investment and store of value. If Bitcoin were to reach a valuation comparable to that half portion of gold’s market cap, Sigel believes the price could trend toward roughly $450,000 per coin over the course of the next cycle. Taking an even more forward-looking perspective, he described VanEck’s long-term model in which global central banks might eventually hold Bitcoin as part of their reserves, even if just at a 2% weighting. Since gold constitutes about 18% of central bank reserves worldwide, Sigel’s assumption is that Bitcoin’s share would be far smaller by comparison. He also factored in the prospect that Bitcoin might one day serve as a settlement currency for global trade, potentially among emerging economic alliances such as the BRICS nations (Brazil, Russia, India, China, and South Africa), which could push its valuation significantly higher. In VanEck’s calculations, this scenario might place Bitcoin at $3 million per coin by 2050: “We also assume that Bitcoin is used as a settlement currency for global trade, most likely among BRICS countries. We get to three million dollars a coin by 2050, which would be about a 16% compound annual growth rate.” At press time, BTC traded at $107,219. Featured image from YouTube / Natalie Brunell, chart from TradingView.com
tags: Bitcoin|bitcoin|Bitcoin Cycle Top Indicators|Bitcoin news|bitcoin price|bitcoin price prediction|btc|BTC news|btc price|Matthew Sigel|VanEck

title: Europe Strategic Bitcoin Reserve: Sarah Knafo Declares ‘No to Digital Euro, Yes to Bitcoin’
body: The post Europe Strategic Bitcoin Reserve: Sarah Knafo Declares ‘No to Digital Euro, Yes to Bitcoin’ appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News In the latest development, a European MP has advocated for a “ Strategic Bitcoin Reserve ” in the European Parliament, highlighting Bitcoin’s growing recognition as a sovereign hedge asset. Sarah Knafo, a French magistrate and a member of the European Parliament since June, in a pro-Bitcoin speech, has urged the European Union to create a strategic Bitcoin reserve and opposed the proposed “digital euro,” a central bank digital currency (CBDC) being developed by the European Central Bank (ECB). “No to the digital euro, yes to a strategic Bitcoin reserve,” Knafo noted in an X post. NO to the digital euro YES to a strategic reserve of BITCOIN (Speech in French at the European Parliament, translated by IA) pic.twitter.com/QDmdodpDEQ — Sarah Knafo (@knafo_sarah) December 17, 2024 .article-inside-link { margin-left: 0 !important; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; border-left: 0; border-right: 0; padding: 10px 0; text-align: left; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li { font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; font-weight: 600; list-style-type: none; margin-bottom: 0; display: inline-block; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li:last-child { display: none; } Also Read : Bitcoin Price Prediction 2025: $150K by Mid-Year, Reveal Experts , Cites Instances Of El Savador, US She cited instances of the President of El Salvador who decided to invest in BTC for his country while being ridiculed by the political class and the IMF. She stressed that he now shows a 100% return with hundreds of millions of dollars available for his people. She underscored that the whole world is now getting ready to take advantage of this revolution in decentralized finance. Notably, the Trump administration is set to create a strategic Bitcoin reserve for the U.S. She also pointed to U.S. Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell’s striking comparison of Bitcoin as digital gold as the cryptocurrency surges to new heights. With Bitcoin skyrocketing, she boldly asked: What is the European Union doing to keep up? Could Bitcoin reserves shape a nation’s future? Read Bitcoin price prediction to see how crypto adoption is changing the global economy! Time For A ‘Paradigm Shift’ She emphasized that its time for the EU to stop wasting money and address growing deficits. The EU’s heavy regulation and taxes are stifling progress. She suggests rejecting the European Central Bank’s digital Euro, which could give bureaucrats too much control over transactions. Instead, she suggests embracing freedom by investing in Bitcoin, building national reserves, and supporting the mining industry. She added that France, with its nuclear power advantage, should stop taxing cryptocurrency holders who have earned their savings through intelligence and risk. “It’s time to change the paradigm. It’s time to protect our people from inflation and the poor economic choices of our states. It is time to say no to the totalitarian temptations of the ECB, which wants to impose a fully controlled digital Euro. It’s time for our states to invest in Bitcoin to build national strategic reserves. title: LayerEdge Integrates with Babylon to Make Bitcoin Backed Internet A Reality
body: LayerEdge and Babylon are thrilled to announce their integration, marking a groundbreaking step in decentralized trust and zk-based settlement on Bitcoin, powering Bitcoin’s security for all layers and apps. Babylon’s Euphrates Devnet now powers LayerEdge’s architecture, unlocking a synergy that merges Bitcoin’s unmatched economic security with LayerEdge’s zk-proof aggregation technology. Together, this partnership transforms Bitcoin into a bedrock for secure, scalable, and decentralized protocols. Babylon: Unlocking Bitcoin’s Crypto-Economic Security Babylon empowers decentralized networks by allowing Bitcoin holders to stake their BTC to secure new decentralized systems, including Proof-of-Stake (PoS) chains, Layer 2 solutions, and Data Availability (DA) layers. Babylon provides: Decentralized Trust: Enabling newer chains to inherit Bitcoin’s security without compromising decentralization. Focus on Innovation: Allowing protocols to prioritize scalability, usability, and innovation while benefiting from Bitcoin-staked finality. Shared Security: Leveraging Bitcoin’s PoW model to create a secure ecosystem for emerging protocols. By leveraging Bitcoin’s economic security, Babylon ensures decentralized networks remain resilient to attacks like 51% attacks, fostering trust and scalability. LayerEdge: Powering the ZK Economy LayerEdge builds on Babylon’s security guarantees by extending its functionality to zk-powered ecosystems. With its cutting-edge zk-proof aggregation technology, LayerEdge ensures Bitcoin-backed crypto-economic security for zk protocols, appchains, and more. Key benefits of LayerEdge include: Cost-Efficient Proof Aggregation: Aggregating multiple zk-proofs into a single compact proof, reducing verification costs and on-chain footprint by up to 99%. Batching Across Chains: Supporting zk-proof batching across multiple chains and protocols, optimizing throughput and scalability while minimizing Bitcoin blockspace consumption. Preconfirmations: Providing preconfirmations within 10 seconds, enabling zk protocols to operate smoothly and securely before final settlement on Bitcoin. Modular Growth: Acting as a backbone for modular ecosystems, enabling protocols to scale seamlessly without high settlement costs. The Bitcoin ZK Powerhouse: Babylon + LayerEdge Together, Babylon and LayerEdge form the Bitcoin ZK Growth Engine, combining Bitcoin’s economic security with zk-proof efficiency to create a robust, scalable ecosystem for decentralized applications. Babylon: Delivers Bitcoin-backed security, ensuring decentralized trust for protocols. LayerEdge: Offers zk-proof aggregation, preconfirmations, and efficient settlement on Bitcoin. This synergy empowers zk protocols to innovate and scale confidently on Bitcoin, fostering new use cases, modularity, and affordability. Voices from the Team “We’re excited about LayerEdge’s launch on Babylon and what this means for zk protocols tapping into Bitcoin’s security,” said Clayton Menzel, Head of Business Development at Babylon. “This integration is a significant step in unlocking 21 million BTC to secure the decentralized economy and enabling efficient, trust-minimized settlement on Bitcoin via LayerEdge.” Ayush Gupta, Co-Founder & CEO of LayerEdge, added, “Babylon brings Bitcoin’s crypto-economic security guarantees to the LayerEdge network and our Universal Validator Set (UVS). Together, we ensure that any zk protocol can launch decentralized from day one with trust-minimized settlement on Bitcoin.” Unlocking New Use Cases for ZK Protocols The integration creates unparalleled opportunities for zk protocols and applications, including: On-Chain Gaming: Verifiable, low-latency outcomes for blockchain-based gaming. ZK Oracles: Trusted, low-cost data verification for decentralized applications. Fast Bridging: Secure, trust-minimized cross-chain transfers powered by zk aggregation. Rollups and Appchains: Instant finality and cost-efficient verification for scaling decentralized apps on Bitcoin. Identity Protocols: Efficient zk-proof aggregation for secure identity verification. Benefits for Builders Protocols and applications building on the Babylon + LayerEdge stack gain access to: Bitcoin-Backed Security: Shared security ensures protocols inherit Bitcoin’s trusted network. Cost-Effective Aggregation: zk-proof aggregation drastically reduces settlement costs. Accelerated Growth: Builders can focus on innovation, knowing their protocol is decentralized, secure, and economically scalable from day one. A Modular, Secure, and Scalable Future for Bitcoin The integration of Babylon and LayerEdge represents the next phase in Bitcoin’s evolution—transforming it into a scalable and affordable foundation for zk protocols and decentralized applications. Together, Babylon and LayerEdge are paving the way for a secure, modular, and scalable future for Bitcoin-based ecosystems, unlocking new possibilities across gaming, identity, DeFi, and beyond.

title: EU Parliament Member pushes for a strategic Bitcoin reserve and says ‘no’ to digital euro
body: French Parliament Member, Sarah Knafo, urges the EU to ‘bet on Bitcoin’ by building national strategic Bitcoin reserves while rejecting the central bank’s plan for a digital euro. In a video shared on her X account on Dec. 17, Knafo delivered a speech in parliament, calling for European nations to start building national Bitcoin ( BTC ) reserves, develop the crypto mining industry and stop hiking up taxes on crypto holders. “It’s time to bet on freedom, it is time for our states to bet on Bitcoin. To build national strategic reserves. It is time to develop the mining industry,” said Knafo. She took the opportunity to oppose the European Central Bank’s plan to create a digital euro , a mechanism that she believes would only give the bank more power over people’s finances due to how centralized the digital euro was. “We do not want this dystopian world where a European bureaucrat will be able to prohibit certain transactions and even eliminate us from the banking system with a click for a simple comment made on social media or for stating an opinion that disagrees with them.” Sarah Knafo, Member of the European Parliament In the beginning of her speech, she cited El Salvador’s decision to invest in cryptocurrency back in 2021 and Donald Trump’s commitment to establishing a strategic Bitcoin reserve in the U.S. as key examples for how the world has shifted towards decentralized finance. “The whole world is now preparing to take advantage of this decentralized finance revolution. Donald Trump to build strategic Bitcoin reserve for the U.S. Jerome Powell, the Chairman of the U.S. Federal Reserve is now talking about digital gold. Bitcoin is exploding,” said Knafo, referring to Bitcoin’s major milestone of surpassing the $100,000 threshold for the first time in history and the U.S Fed Chairman’s comments that compare Bitcoin to gold. Read more: ECB official calls for urgency on digital euro amid global CBDC race She criticized the EU over their poor decision of still hanging onto the traditional finance systems that are much more prone to economic crises such as inflation and deficits. Knafo claimed that the EU “is squandering our money on unbelievable mismanagement” because it refuses to turn to crypto as a more reliable alternative to store its national funds. “It is time for a paradigm shift. It is time to protect our people from inflation and the poor economic choices of our states,” she stated. In the past few months, several nations have been leaning towards plans of building a Bitcoin reserve. On Dec. 16, Donald Trump reaffirmed his plans to build a strategic Bitcoin reserve as part of his plan to make America the “crypto capital.” In addition, states across the country are in the process of passing Bitcoin reserve bills, including Texas, Alabama and Pennsylvania. Prior to that, lawmakers in both Japan and Russia have urged their governments to consider establishing a national Bitcoin reserve to protect the national funds of their respective nations. On Nov. 26, Brazilian legislators in the Chamber of Deputies proposed a Bitcoin bill that would limit Brazil’s reserves to approximately $18.5 billion worth of Bitcoin. Read more: CZ highlights how governments are leaning towards BTC strategic reserves

title: XRP price rises ahead of RLUSD launch, but a reversal is possible
body: The XRP price continued rising, becoming one of the best-performing large-cap cryptocurrencies in the market. Ripple ( XRP ) surged by over 12%, extending an uptrend that began on December 10 when the token bottomed at $1.9065. The rally came after Brad Garlinghouse, Ripple’s CEO, announced that the company would launch the RLUSD stablecoin on Dec. 17 . The stablecoin will initially debut on major exchanges such as Uphold, Bitstamp, MoonPay, and others. The launch follows Ripple developers receiving approval from New York authorities after months of regulatory review. Ripple Labs aims for RLUSD to become a significant player in the stablecoin industry by offering enterprise-grade solutions. Additionally, Ripple hopes RLUSD will complement XRP to boost cross-border transaction volumes in the coming months. Still, RLUSD faces substantial risks ahead. The biggest risk is that it may not gain traction among users after all. Some stablecoins launched by big companies have failed to become popular in the past. For example, Justin Sun’s USDD stablecoin’s market cap has remained around $740 million since its launch in 2022. Similarly, PayPal USD, which was launched in 2023 by PayPal, has struggled and has $458 million in assets. On the other hand, Tether ( USDT ) has continued to grow its market share as its market cap has jumped to over $140 billion. It has become the most used stablecoin in the industry, with a market dominance of over 66%. You might also like: Bitcoin is “under-exposed” to corporate adoption, says VanEck’s Matthew Sigel XRP price chart points to potential risks XRP price chart | Source: crypto.news The other potential risk for the Ripple price is that users may sell the news. This is a situation where users buy an asset in anticipation of a major event and then sell it when it happens. A good example of this is what happened after the last Bitcoin ( BTC ) halving in April. Bitcoin rose ahead of the halving and then retreated after it happened. Another technical risk for XRP is a developing double-top pattern at $2.90. A double-top is a bearish chart formation that often precedes a price pullback. In this case, XRP may hit $2.90 and then retrace to its neckline at $1.90. Furthermore, the coin could experience mean reversion, where the price falls back toward its key moving averages. Currently, XRP trades about 60% above the 50-day moving average, increasing the likelihood of a correction. Conversely, a move above the double-top resistance at $2.90 would invalidate the bearish outlook and could propel XRP toward the $5 level. You might also like: Ripple CTO warns of RLUSD launch volatility, says “don’t FOMO into a stablecoin”

title: Tech YouTuber unlocks native PS3 emulation on PS5 hardware
body: A tech YouTuber recently experimented with PS5 hardware to prove it can run PS3 games. Lowest Logan’s experiment used an AMD BC-250 mining card and was able to run games like Gran Turismo 5 Prologue. The YouTuber also noted that game performance could be improved through optimization. Game emulation has remained a contentious area within the gaming world, with many gamers opting for PCs to emulate games across the board. However, with many tech developments, console gamers have joined in on the fun, with PlayStation emulation steadily growing and techies performing experiments. In one such case, a YouTuber experimented using underclocked hardware to debunk beliefs such as those stating that PS5 cannot run PS3 games. YouTuber proves that the PS5 can run PS3 games A tech YouTuber named Lowest Logan successfully used PS5 hardware to run PS3 games in a groundbreaking experiment. Logan used the AMD BC-250 mining card, which has a system-on-chip (SoC) similar to the PS5’s native chip but with limited CPU and GPU capabilities. The chip has six cores and 12 threads, and only 24 out of the original 32 GPU compute units are active. The BC-250 chip was limited to 450MHz clock speed with the Youtuber’s setup using 16 GB of GDDR6 memory. The YouTuber’s experiment also used RPCS3, the popular open-source PS3 emulator compatible with Windows, macOS, Linux, and FreeBSD. Logan’s experiment proved that the PS5’s setup can run PS3 games built using the complex CELL-based model by converting them to x86-compatible instructions. Logan’s improvised setup ran games such as Gran Turismo 5 Prologue, Watch Dogs, and LittleBigPlanet 2 at 60fps. The experiment was able to run the games with occasional shader compilation stutters being the only major issue despite increasing the resolution to 1440p. Logan’s experiment upstages previous attempts at backward compatibility on Sony consoles, which left many believing it was impossible. Watch Dogs notably had more glitches than the other games. The tech YouTuber attributed the extra glitches to the game’s original PS3 optimization issues. Logan reignited backward compatibility debates After his successful experiment, Logan reignited debates about the PS5’s untapped potential for backward compatibility without requiring cloud streaming. The YouTuber’s approach overcame many technical and software limitations while also using an underpowered setup to run PS3 games. Gamers pointed out that Logan’s experiment disproved Sony’s initial stance that implied that native PS3 emulation on the PS5 is not feasible due to technical barriers and high costs. Many gamers argued that Sony’s staff are not as competent or motivated when working towards providing backward compatibility for previous PlayStation consoles. The gamers stated that the problem was not the hardware but rather the PS3’s software issues that Sony was unwilling to address. Some gamers stated that Sony should do a better job since most PS1, PS2, and PS3 games could be properly emulated using a PC or other consoles such as the Steam Deck.
